io.purplejs.core

Enum RunMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RunMode>
      • io.purplejs.core.RunMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<RunMode>

    public enum RunMode
extends Enum<RunMode>
    Run-mode is used to indicate which environment the engine is running in. The engine can be configured differently depending on the run-mode. The run-mode can also be set using a system property (io.purplejs.runMode).

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DEV
      Development mode.
      PROD
      Production mode.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • PROD

        public static final RunMode PROD
        Production mode. This is the default mode.

      • DEV

        public static final RunMode DEV
        Development mode. When using this the script-cache will be refreshed if scripts are changed.
